Ewwwww

Alright, I know that all I'd do is just repeating the same things again, but :

- Contact Methods and Profile Information fields on the user profile page has been broken (it just shows "array"), even though the location under the user profile next to posts are showing correctly;

- Reactions has been disabled for a technical reason.

Wishing all the best to the moderators and web developers / forum maintainers here ! がんばれ！
